description:
Description :
-----------------
Test hard reboot the server twice without wait time.

The first call of reboot return the accepted status 202. When tried to reboot the server second without wait time returned the 422.
Expected Result;
------------------------
Server should reboot twice without giving any exception

Reference link:
--------------------
http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/1.1/content/Reboot_Server-d1e3371.html
title: Reboot server twice without wait for the server to become active is failing
